messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] COmics was: NEW unschooling thread
messages.msgSnippet: ... Comics are the best!! I ve often thought of writing an article called Garfield Taught My Son To Read . Truly. Between going through all our old baby/kid
messages.messageBody:
>>Thanks Dar, I didn't even THINK of comic books!
>She loves them!>>

Comics are the best!! I've often thought of writing an article called
"Garfield Taught My Son To Read". Truly. Between going through all our old
baby/kid books and reading his favorite comics, Conor became a reader. (That
and a desperate desire to read Harry Potter on his own.)

As far as easy-ish yet interesting books, have you tried the Magic Treehouse
series? Casey loves those. She also likes Nate the Great and anything with a
bit of a mystery in it. Conor liked The Zach Files.

Life is good.
~Mary
